name: NZIPS
title: NZIPS FHIR Implementation Guide
description: Draft implementation guide for the NZIPS

resource.name: NZIPS MedicationStatement
resource.description: A record of medication being taken is represented in the patient summary as an instance of an MedicationStatement resource constrained by this profile. Based on the IPS profile.

resource.name: NZIPS-Patient
resource.description: NZ International Patient Summary patient resource. This profile derives from the [International Patient summary](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/) with localisations using international and NZ Government standards for the NZ context.

resource.name: NZIPS-Problem
resource.description: NZ IPS problem (FHIR Condition resource). This profile derives from the [International Patient Summary](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/) Condition resource used to document a health problem, with localisations using international and NZ Government standards for the NZ context.

resource.name: CountryOfBirth
resource.description: Code for the person's country of birth as an ISO 3166-1-2-alpha code

resource.name: MaoriDescent
resource.description: Code indicting whether the person is of Māori descent

resource.name: Māori Descent
resource.description: A code indicating whether a person is of Māori descent

resource.name: Māori Descent
resource.description: NZ Māori Descent Statistical Standard: 09 Dec 1998.
